# update

**Instance Method**

Updates an item in the data source array.

## Declaration

```swift
void update(
    in Array items, 
    in Array indexTitle, 
    in int segmentSize
);
```

## Discussion

The update API allows the existing data source to reuse already loaded items. This reduces any flashes that might traditionally occur in the UI because of these updates.

## Modifying the Data Source

- **insert**: Inserts a new item into the array.
- **delete**: Deletes an item from the data source array.
- **move**: Moves an item in the data source array.
- **replace**: Replaces an item in the data source array.
